text: Hini na nina bakholwayo! Ningalandeli ikhondo likaShaytân. Nabani na ke kuni olandela ikhondo likaShaytân, inene yena (uShaytân) uyalela ukungcola nokwenziwa kobugwenxa. Kananjalo ukuba bekungekho ngenxa yoBabalo luka-Allâh nenceba yaKhe kuni, bekungayi kubakho namnye kuni obeza kuba nyulu, kodwa Yena uAllâh uhlambulula lowo Athande (ukumhlambulula), yaye uAllâh nguSokuva, nguSolwazi
